==February==
* '''[[7 February|7]]''' - Author [[Lin Carter]] dies.

* '''[[29 July|29]]''' - [[Mythcon 19]] begins.

==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[Mythcon 19]] ends.
* '''[[25 August|25]] - ''[[The Return of the Shadow]]'' is published.'''

==September==
* '''[[23 September|23]]-[[25 September|25]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1988]].
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 1]] is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 25|''Mallorn'' 25]] is published.

==October==

==November==
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 2]] is published.
==?==
* '''?''' - The [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]] is founded.
* '''?''' - The poem ''[[Narqelion]]'' is published in [[Mythlore]].
* '''?''' - [[Melbourne House]] publish ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's War in Middle Earth]]'' 
* '''?''' - [[Johan de Meij]] finishes his ''[[Symphony No. 1 "The Lord of the Rings"]]''.
* '''?''' - ''[[A Question of Time]]'' by [[Verlyn Flieger]] is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Arda 1984/1985]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree 1989 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1989 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The Tolkien Calendar 1989]] is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Minas Tirith (1988 book)]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Shadow in the South]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mouths of the Entwash]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Raiders of Cardolan]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Teeth of Mordor (book)]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Halls of the Elven-king]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien and Romanticism]]'' is published.
